item.title: Linux Sem
item.description: int sem_init(sem_t *sem, int pshared, unsigned int value) 初始化m_sem value为指定信号量的初始值 pshared为0 信号量在进程的线程之间共享 pshared非0 信号量在进程之间共享 Reference: https://blog.csdn.net/m0_45867846/article/details/109021863
